channel.title: Buggy magic on npcs
channel.description:
if i use a magic spell on a npc, it works fine, but whenever i walk away without killing the npc, it will follow me everywhere! and it keeps attacking, anyone knows how to turn off this following? or limit the following to a small area? :|
im using p16 v6 source
